title: Dinosaurs
creator_credit: Peter Bence, Steve Skok and Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Ed, Schools Div, Victoria
brief_description: Fossil records show that the dinosaurs were an enormously successful group containing many species. This program examines the reasons why they were so prolific and discusses some of the theories behind their disappearance.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Bence, Steve Skok and Curriculum Branch, Ministry of Ed, Schools Div, Victoria
description: Fossil records show that the dinosaurs were an enormously successful group containing many species. This program examines the reasons why they were so prolific and discusses some of the theories behind their disappearance.
